title: [URF] QQ Nidalee
body:
LichBane, Luden's Echo -- Void, Abyssal's -- Zhonya's, Rabadons

QQ all day

replies.body:
Any feedback on this build? I find it broken.

Spears do TONS of damage ;)
You're mobile bc of lich/luden's movement speed bonus
You have aoe because of Ludens
You have Zhonya's
You have tons of magic penetration
You have magic resist ( Abyssals ) and armour ( Zhonya's )

What's missing?
I think you mean QQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQ E QQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQ Nidalee?
